sentence.Network_en: He had been railed against by them as a prig and a poseur.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们责骂他是一个沾沾自喜、装腔作势的人.

sentence.Network_en: I am sometimes accused of being an inveterate poseur.
sentence.Network_cn: 有时有人说我惯于装模作样。

sentence.Network_en: Some people admired him greatly while others considered him a poseur.
sentence.Network_cn: 有的人对他佩服得五体投地,而有的人则认为他装腔作势.

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE逆序_馆档网 ... entrepreneur 企业家，创业人 poseur 装模作样的人 connoisseur 鉴赏家，行家.
林肯公园(Linkin Park)是一组来自美国加州的摇滚乐队,也被认为是新金属(nu metal)、装模作样(poseur)最成功的乐团回复血之子民六翼天岚啥子?装模.

list.abs: She a poseur girl ., 她是个装模作样的女孩.

entry.tran: 装腔作势的人；装模作样的人
entry.def: You can describe someone as a poseur when you think that they behave in an insincere or exaggerated way because they want to make a particular impression on other people.

example.ex: I am sometimes accused of being an inveterate poseur.
example.tran: 有时有人说我惯于装模作样。

means.word_mean: 1. a person who habitually pretends to be something he is not

auth_sentence.content: His life as self-styled genius and unrepentant poseur continues to tantalize.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: His life as self-styled genius and unrepentant poseur continues to tantalize.

auth_sentence.res_content: His poses, while retaining a certain mythic charge, confirmed him as a poseur.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His poses, while retaining a certain mythic charge, confirmed him as a poseur.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 业余[水平]的[运动员、艺术家等]
stems_affixes.word_buile: amat爱+eur人→爱的人→业余爱好者
con全部+noiss=know知道+eur……人→n.鉴赏家,行家
entrepren=enterprise企业,事业+eur……人→n.[法]企业家,主办人
pose摆姿势+eur……人→poseur装模作样的人
racont=recount叙述+eur……人→n.善于讲故事的人

stems_affixes.value_cn: 从事破坏活动者,怠工者
stems_affixes.word_buile: sabot木履,木鞋+eur……人→把木履放到机器上进行破坏怠工
